Observation and handling of energies 

Risk Based Observation technique - RIBO 

OVERSIGHT: Before starting a job, stop and get an overview of the area in which you are about to work. 
LIMIT THE AREA: Split the working area into smaller segments to give you the required overview. 
SPOT ENERGY: Identify those types of energies in and around your work area that can represent a risk. Implement and note eventual measures to be taken to secure safe job execution.

html.font: \n\nThe e-mail or phone number has to be registered on your card on sikkerhetskort.no By verifying the cards connected to the contact point will automatically be syncronized to your Trainor account. In addition your competence will be syncronized to sikkerhetskort.no
\n\nI have verified all my e-mails and phone numbers but am still missing one or more safety cards.

\nAsk your closest leader or responsible for safety cards in your company what e-mail address or phone number you are registered with on Sikkerhetskort.no. This information needs to be filled in and correct before you can syncronize your safety cards.
\n\nWhy do I have to confirm my e-mail or phone number to see my safety card?
\nTo be sure that no one is pretending to be you when you enter a facility, we must confirm that the card issued is intended for you.
\nBecause we do not know which email is connected to a security card, you may want to confirm everyone.
